data.name: Pokaban
data.detailed_description:
Pokaban is a puzzle game where you push cards around to make poker hands. There are marked positions that correlate to a poker hand on the screen. Once enough cards are added to a hand it will be compared with the dealer's hand. If all of your hands beat the dealer then you win the match!

How to Play


Push cards:


When pushed into a slot the card is added to a hand


Once a hand is completed it will be compared with the dealer

You cannot


Push more than one card


Pull cards

Wild


Wild cards can take the place of any other card. It makes creating poker hands more challenging. Like other cards you can place wild cards into marked positions to add to your hand.



Positions on the game board can be marked as wild. Placing a card there will turn all cards sharing the rank and suit into wild cards. Be careful though this will affect the dealer' cards as well.



These modifiers affect the dealer's cards as well so use them carefully.

Suit Swap


Placing a card onto a position marked with another suit will swap the suits of both cards.

Additional features

  • 100+ levels
  • Unlimited undo/redo
  • Fully configurable keyboard/gamepad mapping
  • Relaunch right where you left off
  • Stars track progress and show achievement

data.short_description: Push cards strategically into marked positions to create a poker hand. Beat the dealer's hand to win. Sokoban with poker mechanics.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz+, 64-bit
  • Memory: 600 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X1300/NVIDIA GeForce 6600 GT/Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Intel High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Snow Leopard 10.6
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz+, 64-bit
  • Memory: 600 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X1300/NVIDIA GeForce 6600 GT/Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Intel High Definition Audio

Recommended:

  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz+, 64-bit
  • Memory: 600 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X1300/NVIDIA GeForce 6600 GT/Intel HD 3000 or better
